ba dang / /gzhan yang gang dag glu rnams dang / /shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/ /hU~M brjod 'jigs 'gyur smos ci dgos/ /lha min srin po ma rungs pa/ /yi dgas grul bum mngag gzhug dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi pho nya

rnams/ /'di ltar gyur pa ci zhig smos/ /byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje la yang mnyam bzhag nas/ /byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis/ /phyag rgya bsdu ba bsam par bya/ /nyes pa cung zad tsam gyi

phyir/ /bgegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya/ /shin tu sdang bar rig nas su/ /gal te bgegs la gnod bya na/ /shin tu sdang ba drags rnams la/ /'jam des nyid du mi bya'o/ /gal te 'jam des nyid byas na/ /de yi mod la

gnod pa byed/ /thog mar 'jam por sbyar bar bya/ /lan gnyis tshe na dbye bar brtson/ /gsum tshe mchod yon thogs nas su/ /me tog snyim par gnas byas la/ /de nas bgegs la mchod par bya/ /'byung po kun phan gtor

byin na/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig brjod de/ /bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis/ /song shig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis/ /phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig /khyod kyi stobs dang rtsal mthong ste/ /khyod ni bgegs kyang byed par

nus/ /khyod ni lha yi sprul pa ste/ /khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus min/ /sngon cad mchod pa ma thob pa/ /de ring bdag gis mchod byas na/ /khyod kyis da ni mchod khyer la/ /bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod/ /gal
te 'dug kyang bgegs min na/ /de ni spyod pa bzang po yin/ /sngags pas mchod byas 'os kyang ni/ /ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na/ /phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas/ /mi mchog rnams kyis mkhyen par
gsol/ /bgegs la chad pas bcad slad du/ /sbyor ba bgyis kyang nongs ma mchis/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/ /byang chub sems dpa' pa rnams kyis/ /bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod/ /lha

dang lha min gsang rnams dang / /phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang / /gza' dang mi 'am ci gang dag /mgon po mgon po che rnams la/ /bgegs kyis gtses pa bsgrag par bya/ /gal te chung zhig bskyab ce na/ /myur du yongs

su skyobs shig ces/ /bsgrags pa gal te mnyan byas nas/ /bgegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni/ /de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi/ /lha rnams la ni mchod par bya/ /gal te de ltar mi 'dug na/ /me tog thal mo mchod

yon gyis/ /sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskul la/ /de la chad pas bcad par bya/ /drag po shin tu sdang sems can/ /bka' lung las ni 'gal byed cing / /srog kyang shin tu 'phrog byed la/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang mi

g.yel ba/ /de la phan par shes nas su/ /bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/ /sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi/ /sdug bsngal mang po 'dir 'gyur zhes/ /ji ltar sman pas sems can gyi/ /nad rnams gso bar byed pa bzhin/ /

gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med/ /mkhas pas rnam par spangs ma yin/ /de ltar sems ni mnyam bzhag cing / /snying rje yid dang ldan pa yis/ /byang chub sems ni brtan byas te/ /de la chad pas bcad pa brtsam/ /ji ltar sman

pa mkhas pa yis/ /nyes te yal bar mi 'dor zhing / /thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yang / /mi byed mkhas na 'ang nyes dang bcas/ /ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa/ /thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis/ /nad pa yal bar 'dor byed

cing / /gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa/ /de bzhin shes dang bral ba yis/ /gal te gso bar brtson na yang / /thabs dang shes rab bral ba la/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad/ /nad pa nad pa rnams la ni/ /

sman pa ji ltar sman byin na/ /tsha dang kha dang bska ba yang / /'jig rten smod par mi byed pa/ /de bzhin 'dul ba'i bye brag gis/ /ci rigs pa ni gso bar bya/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ /phyas te sangs rgyas rnams

mi smod/ /'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba/ /shin tu rmad byung rgyal ba byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las/ /'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste/ /shin tu sdang sems drag po yi/ /sems can thams cad de tshe byung / /shin tu drag po mthong

nas ni/ /'jam po nyid du mi sbyor ro/ /shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can/ /rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ /snying rje'i snying stobs khros gyur pa/ /sems can rnams la phan byed pas/ /de nas pha rol gnon pa yis/ /sems

can khams ni du ma gnon/ /sdig med nan gyi stobs kyis su/ /thams cad dbang du dgod par bya/ /pha rol gnon pa'i rigs tshul gyis/ /ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas nas/ /sems can khams ni du ma dag /thams cad dbang du dgod

par byas/ /rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams de ltar dgod/ /byang chub sems dran bsgom byas na/ /skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir sngags pa che khros la/ /bskal pa'i me yi mthu lta bus/ /rdo rje ral

gri phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya/ /rkang pa'i tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /rdo rje gar gyis gar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor/ /rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te/ /bsnun bya rked pa'i gnas su ni/ /

ral gri shubs su zhugs par bya/ /mnan pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /shugs kyis lag pa sar bsdams la/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /ral gri phyung ba 'dra bar bzung / /ral gri tshul du gzhug pa ni/ /'dzub mo gung mo gshib par

bya/ /de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ /ral gri shubs su bya ba ni/ /mthe'u chung dang ni srin lag dang / /mthe bos ral gri shubs su bya/ /de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis/ /sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris te/ /so yis mchu mnan khros byas la/ /rang gi

rdo rje nyi 'bar bas/ /rkang pas mgo ni mnan byas la/ /lag pas ral gri phyung nas su/ /de ni rdo rje gom stabs kyis/ /gar gyi tshul du kun bskyod cing / /rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gcad par bya/ /rdo rje

ldan des gang bcom pa/ /de yi srog la mi sems so/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /yang na 'chir 'gyur the tsom med/ /brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs shig na/ /de yi mod la brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon che/ /snying rje

snying brtse sems ldan pas/ /ji ltar de yang skye bar 'gyur/ /de ltar de la snying brtser bya/ /rdo rje ral gri stangs stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje slob dpon ches/ /rdo rje gtub par bya ba byas/ /rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis/ /gnod par sems

pa thams cad gtub/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la/ /rkang pa bteg cing bzhag tshul gyis/ /rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/ /'khor lo rgyas par bya rims kyis/ /pad ma thal mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa

rnam par bzhag byas nas/ /sa la 'khor lo 'phang bar bya/ /rting sprad gnas su 'dug byas nas/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hU~M brjod de/ /thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/ /sa la 'khor los bsnun par bya/ /bzlog ste lan bur

byas nas su/ /lag pa sbyor ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /'khor lo lta bur byas nas su/ /gyen du 'phangs la gzhig par bya/ /bkug ste rkang pas mgo mnan nas/ /bgegs rnams la ni bsnun par bya/ /'on tam rab tu zhi bar

'gyur/ /yang na shi 'gyur the tsom med/ /de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis/ /bgegs rnams la ni gnod par bya/ /sdig pa'i gnod pa med par ni/ /bskul yang bde bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gal te rdo rje sems dpa' che/ /snying rje

sems dang ldan 'gyur bas/ /bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na/ /cho ga 'di yi tshul du bya/ /ba lang gi ni lci ba las/ /de 'dra ba yi gzugs byas la/ /sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis ni/ /sngags pas 'o mas bkrus nas su/ /

mod la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /de ltar kun du bgegs rnams ni/ /kun la cho ga bzhin du bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /gsang sngags rnams la 'ang sbyar bya ste/ /bcad dang gnon pa byas pa dang / /bkag pa dang ni

bcings pa 'ang rung / /gal te bsgrub par 'dod na ni/ /de nas snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur/ /'on tam gsang sngags rnams la ni/ /bye brag tu ni spos kyis bya/ /ba ni ser mo'i 'o ma 'am/ yang na mar gyi sbyin bsreg bya/ /yang na brgya

ni rtsa brgyad kyis/ /sbyin sreg gis ni kun zhir 'gyur/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas par ro/ /drag shul spyod las gang yin pa/ /de ni khros pa brtsam par bya/ /ji ltar las ni ci rigs par/ /

gsang sngags rnams la sngags pas bya/ /gzhan du na ni mi bya ste/ /las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'khor lo stangs stabs so/ /rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang / /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su/ /mtshogs mar thal mo

sbyar nas de/ /rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya/ /rting sprad gnas kyi tshul gyis so/ /smin bsgyur rked par reg par bya/ /lag pa gnyis ga sa la byug /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis so/ /

rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /lag gnyis rked pa'i gnas bzhag la/ /rdo rje brgad pa rab byed cing / /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya/ /rdo rje 'dzub mos rab tu bsdigs/ /hU~M brjod bsgyings dang bcas

par bya/ /rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas/ /rdo rje'i mdzub mos bsdigs nas ni/ /bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang / /bltas pas de ni mod la 'bros/ /bya rog bong rdo 'phen mthong bzhin/ /rdo rje brgad pa'o/ /de nas

rdo rje sngags pa ches/ /rdo rje 'byung bya byas nas su/ /mi mthun rkang bstabs byas nas su/ /lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang / /mthe bo gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng bar bya/ /'dzub

mo de gnyis zla ba bsgreng / /rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg par bya/ /g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya/ /rdo rje lce ni me ltar 'bar/ /rgod ma'i kha ltar mngon sum bya/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hU~M brjod de/ /

kha yi thad kar bzhag par bya/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni thams cad kyi/ /rgya mtsho bzhi yi chu 'thung na/ /mig sngar snang bar 'gyur pa yin/ /sdang ba kun lta smos ci dgos/ /de ltar byas na phyogs bzhi po/ /kun nas 'byung ba thams

cad skems/ /tshub ma kun dang lce 'bab dang / /sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba yang / /rdo rje kha ni glal ba dang / /gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten du ni ltas byung ba/ /kun nas gnas grub gang yin pa/ /sngags

pas rdo rje me lce yi/ /me lce ltar bsgyur de kun zhi/ /rdo rje kha yi phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya/ /rdo rje kha glal

ba'i stangs stabs so/ /de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che/ /rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs la gso ba byas nas ni/ /nyes pa yod pa ma yin no/ /rgyal ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i/ /rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pas/ /

bdag 'dra bsngags pa de 'dra ste/ /sngags pa ci 'dra rgyal de bzhin/ /sems can kun la snying rje dang / /byang chub sems ni brtan bya ste/ /thabs kyis dam pa thob 'gyur bas/ /rnam par 'phrul ba thams cad la/ /gzhan du

na ni phyogs rnams na/ /bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bsngags mi 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dang bral ba ni/ /lha yi mchod 'os ma yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab bral 'gyur ba/ /rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang / /gang yang rang sangs

rgyas rnams ni/ /dka' thub gnas la gnas pa ste/ /bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pas/ /de dag la ni bya ba med/ /thabs dang ye shes las byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems ni snying rje can/ /byang chub sems kyi shing rta dang / /byams

dang snying rje'i kha sgyur dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang / /bsdu ba bzhi yi rdo rje dang / /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sa dang / /byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag la/ /brten nas sangs rgyas sras po rnams/ /sems can don dga' rtse bas rtse/ /

de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /thabs dang ye shes mkhas pa yis/ /sdang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /sems ni rab tu gso bar bya/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas ni/ /rkang pa mthun pa'i gnas bzhag ste/ /rdo rje

thal mo gzhum byas la/ /rdo rje gar ni byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng / /g.yon pa kos kor brten nas su/ /gung mo dang ni 'dzub mo gshib/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo sprad par bya/ /g.yas pa lha yi ba dan gsum/ /g.yas brkyang rkang par mnan

nas su/ /rdo rje brgad pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /kye ma'o bdag nyid rdo rje can/ /bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas so/ /hU~M brjod bsnyems dang khros pa yis/ /rdo rje gar gyis gtang bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rjes bsdigs/ /rdo rje brgad pas bsdigs pas na/ /lha dang

lha min gsang bar bcas/ /dkyil 'khor tshe 'am bsgrub pa'i tshe/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar bcing / /gcug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum shes/ /

bgegs rnams phan tshun smra byed cing / /bsrung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun/ /lhan cig dkyil 'khor drung du dong / /rdo rje stangs kyis bskul bas na/ /rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsags pa la/ /gzhan rnams thams cad phyag

'tshal lo/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de na yang / /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /pad ma thal mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs byas te/ /bskal pa'i me yi 'od 'dra bas/ /thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su/ /

khros pas lag pa brdab par bya/ /lag gnyis rdo rje tshul gyis su/ /mthe'u chung mthe bo sprad byas la/ /g.yon pa kos kor brten nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /AHhU~M hU~M hU~M brjod de bskul ba yis/ /sngags pas kun du sgra yang

brjod/ /rdo rje sgra ni byung ba na/ /sdang ba thams cad phung bar 'gyur/ /brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs/ /rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' chen yang / /thos pa tsam gyis kun g.yos te/ /kun du sgra yi sems kyang nyams/ /de tshe thal mo sbyar te 'dud/ /

rdo rje sgra chen gang na bar/ /thams cad lhan cig lhags nas su/ /rdo rje sgra yis gzir 'gyur zhing / /stan las sems ni nyams pas na/ /mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba/ /bdag cag myur du bka' stsol ces/ /sngags pa

la ni lung yang nod/ /sngags pas bsams te gar byas na/ /lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur/ /de nas byams pa'i sems bskyed la/ /brtul zhugs can gyis phyag rgya dgrol/ /rdo rje kun du sgra'o/ /rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ /rdo rje

gar ni 'bar byas la/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas te/ /mi mthun rkang stabs byas nas su/ /bsnol te khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /mthe bo gnyis ni gshibs te bsgreng / /gung mo gnyis ni gshibs byas

la/ /'dzub mo dbu ma'i tshigs bkug ste/ /gung mo gnyis la sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje kha na byas pas na/ /sdang ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /kha yi thad kar bzhag na ni/ /rdo rje sgra yang 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bdag ni rdo rje chen po can/ /rdo rje

ye shes stobs dang ldan/ /hri ha hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ /rdo rje gom stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje gnon po'i gom pa yis/ /bzhad dang 'degs pas 'gro byed cing / /phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par bya/ /rdo rje sgra 'byung bskul

bas na/ /bgegs chen rnams dang grags rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha rnams kyang / /de yi mdun du 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig /rdo rje sgra yis bskul ba nas/ /bdag cag rang gi gnas nas

g.yos/ /rdo rje dbang po bka' myur stsol/ /gal te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/ /rgyal srid dngul chu mig bskus dang / /kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam/ /bka' stsol cig ces de skad smra/ /dga' bas byin nas sgrub

po la/ /phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong / /rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje slob dpon mthu chen gyis/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo rje can gyis phyag rgya bcing / /rkang pa pus mor btsugs nas su/ /lag pa

gnyis ni khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas su/ /'dzub mo gnyis ni ngos la sbyar/ /g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas su/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /'khrul 'khor kun las bsnun byas la/ /sgo rnams

thams cad dbye bar bya/ /lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang / /srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang / /thams cad rang gi gnas nas g.yos/ /bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /sems ni glong zhes gyur

nas su/ /rdo rje ye shes cher ldan pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig /sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam/ /'on te dngul chu bcud len bzhed/ /rdo rje dbang pos bka' myur stsol/ /smras nas kun

gyis de mod la/ /yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed/ /gal te lha dang lha min dang / /gsang ba bkol bar 'dod na yang / /'dod pas de dag lhags nas su/ /'dod pa bzhin du las byed do/ /lung dang 'gal bar byed pa dag /ci ste dam bcas

mi 'ong na/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs ldan pa/ /sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang / /me 'bar lta bur 'jigs rung bas/ /myur du rdo rje'i gom stabs kyis/ /sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya/ /g.yas brkyang

gom stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun pas na/ /a la la zhes de skad smra/ /stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams/ /lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po pa/ /

ga la ba der nye bar dong / /skal ba chen pos yongs su skyobs/ /bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol/ /klu dang gsang ba lha min rnams/ /'phral du bsgo ba'i lung bzhin byed/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni bsgrubs nas su/ /rang

rang gi ni gnas su dong / /de lta na ni lha dbang song / /de lta ma yin mi btang ngo / /de nas bsgo lung bzhin byas nas/ /de dag myur du gnas su dong / /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po/ /de nas phyag rgya btang byas te/ /rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis

su/ /rked pa'i gnas su bzhag par bya/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya/ /dus bzhi rab tu bskul byas la/ /gal te bsgo lung

'gal byed na/ /rdo rje lcags kyus dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje'i zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o/ /rdo rje thal mo btsum nas su/ /mthun pa'i stabs su gnas byas te/ /lag pas rgyab tu bsnun byas la/ /rdo rje gyen du

'phang bar bya/ /de nas rdo rje blta byas la/ /'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hU~M brjod de/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo dang / /mthe bo sprad de zhags par bya/ /lag

pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo yis/ /rtse bkug lcags kyus brtan por bya/ /rdo rje rgyas pa'i mig ldan pa/ /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /gang la bgegs ni yod pa der/ /rdo rje stabs kyis myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yas

brkyang stangs byas la/ /rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing / /rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya/ /gal te 'khor lo can dang ni/ /dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa/ /gal te

rdo rje 'chang srung yang / /sngags pas gzhi nas drangs te dgug /bkug nas rdo rjes bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje'i gzeb tu gzhug par bya/ /ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs 'gyur ba/ /de srid bar du bzhag par bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te/ /

gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na/ /bdag gi 'dod pa 'byor 'dod pas/ /de la chad pas bcad par bya/ /de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/ /rdo rje rkang pas gzir byas na/ /a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing / /lha yi dbang po 'ang 'ong

bar 'gyur/ /de la bsgo ba'i lung yang dbog /rdo rje gar gyis de nas yang / /thal mo shin tu sbyar byas la/ /dbang chen stabs kyis 'dug nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul

gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su/ /phan tshun bsnol te khu tshur bcang / /gung mo gnyis ni gshibs nas su/ /'dzub mo de la gzugs par bya/ /nga yi rdo rje phyag rgya de/ /

bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig yin/ /snga ma bzhin gyi stangs tshul gyis/ /phyag rgyas bgegs rnams bkug nas su/ /khro bo yi ni rdo rje 'di/ /de la dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /rdo rje stangs kyi phyag rgya bcing / /hU~M

zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgyur nas su/ /bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ /lan ni smra bar mi byed na/ /de ni btang bar mi bya'o/ /gal te cung zad mi smra na/ /de la chad pas bcad bya ste/ /

shing gi dug dang star bu dang / /yungs kar dag ni bsres pa las/ /de yi gzugs ni byas nas su/ /me yi nang du bor byas na/ /gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang / /bgegs de de yi mod la 'gro/ /sngags pas de la

bsgo bar bya/ /de nas de la rgyas par bya/ /byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su/ /phyag rgya btang bar bsam byas na/ /gzir dang bcing dang dgug pa rnams/ /thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje

'chang / /ye shes che la rab gzhol zhing / /sems can don la snying rje bas/ /rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur te/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /rdo rje thal mo legs sbyar te/ /phyogs rnams

kun du rgyas par bya/ /gom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su/ /g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa spo/ /lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni/ /de nas thal mo rab sbyar ro/ /gom pa bskyod pa'i tshul gyis su/ /mkhas pas phyogs

bzhi rnams su bskor/ /rdo rjes rengs byed phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par bya/ /myur du rdo rje gom pa yis/ /phyogs rnams rdo rje rengs par bya/ /rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che/ /rdo rje mtshan can bsam

par bya/ /'og tu lag pa rdo rje can/ /steng du g.yas pa 'ang rdo rje can/ /rdo rjes rengs byed rab byed cing / /phyogs rnams kun du bskor byas na/ /gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i/ /bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par

'gyur/ /rdo rje rengs byed byas pas na/ /bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed/ /de yi spyi bor rdo rje ni/ /legs par 'dug par bsams byas na/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la thug pa nas/ /sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar/ /rdo rjes

rengs pas rengs 'gyur te/ /rmongs shing sems kyang med par 'gyur/ /sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod bar du/ /de srid du ni rengs par bya/ /rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang / /rdo rje'i gar ni rab byas la/ /mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar

byas te/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas na/ /kun nas byung ba'i chu rnams kyang / /sngags pas bskam par byed par nus/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /rdo rje'i thal mo gzhum byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa

gyen du ni/ /zhags pa bcas pas brkyang bar bya/ /de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni/ /g.yon dang lhan cig gdeg par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /mngon du bskal pa'i me lta

bu/ /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /'og logs su ni mig bltas te/ /rdo rje'i gom pas myur song la/ /rkang pa g.yon pa bskum byas te/ /lhun po rtse mor bzhag par bya/ /'og ma mdzod nas 'byin pa'i lag /

g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te/ /mchod pa'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis/ /kha yi tshul du 'dug par bya/ /rgod ma rta yi kha tshul gyis/ /rgya mtsho chu rnams btung bar bya/ /rdo rje ldan pas bshad pa yi/ /bsam gtan

sngags pa ldan gyur na/ /chu ni a la la zhes su/ /sgra 'byin kun nas 'du 'gyur na/ /'bab chu dang ni chu klung dang / /sprin las byung ba smos ci dgos/ /bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi/ /chu las byung ba 'ang skam par 'gyur/ /

rdo rje'i tshul gyis de nas yang / /rdo rje'i thal mo mtshogs mar sbyar/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas te/ /sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya/ /dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su/ /rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa

g.yon pa bteg bya ste/ /de nas sa la bzhag par bya/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya/ /lag gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su/ /rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa bsgreng / /g.yon pa mkhur bar brten

nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /de bzhin g.yas pa bzhag nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor/ /g.yas pa mkhur bar brten nas su/ /rdo rje ldan pa'i g.yon pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas myur

song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i gom stabs kyis/ /ti se rtse mor rkang bzhag ste/ /rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su/ /rengs byed rtse bar sbyor ldan pas/ /so yis mchu mnan khros gyur

cing / /bdag nyid ma dang 'drar gyur pa/ /stobs chen sgra yang cher ldan pa/ /gtum po chen po pha rol gnon/ /rdo rje tshul gyis steng bskor la/ /nges par gnon pa blang bar bya/ /sngags pa sngags la 'jigs med pa/ /de ni gang

du khros pa 'dor/ /rdo rje des gnas tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa btsugs nas su/ /rdo rje gnon pas bsnun byas na/ /dbang po chen po 'ang phye mar rlog /rdo rje gnon pas bsnun byas na/ /sa rnams thams cad rab tu

g.yo/ /lhun po ma dAr ti se dang / /'khor ri rnams ni g.yo 'gyur na/ /lha min sgo lta smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o/ /bsnun pas rnam pa brgyar 'gyur te/ /phub ma sbar gang rlung gtor bzhin/ /slob

dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /sa sbyang brtsam par bya ba ni/ /rdo rje'i thal mo sbyar nas su/ /snying gar bzhag ste rgyas par bya/ /rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su/ /lag pa gar byed sbyor ba dang / /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /

g.yas dang g.yon pa bzhag par bya/ /rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su/ /de nas rting pa yang sprad de/ /gar gyi tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor bar bya/ /khros pas dbus kyi gnas su ni/ /rdo rje gom pas myur

song la/ /rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su/ /gung mos srin lag 'khyud byas la/ /gnyi ga khu tshur bcangs byas la/ /rting pa sprad pa'i rkang stabs kyis/ /sa la bzhag dang bteg bya ste/ /g.yas su yongs su rgyas byas la/ /ba

bar bur thams cad bsal bar bya/ /me me zhes ni brjod byas la/ /nang na gang dag ci yod pa/ /sngags pas thams cad bsal bar bya/ /hU~M dang bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i/ /gsang sngags mkhas pas brjod par bya/ /'og da

dang sa yi steng na ni/ /bar bur thams cad zhir 'gyur te/ /kun du bgegs ni med gyur na/ /sngags pas mnyam gzhag las rnams bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje bzhag pa legs bslabs pas/ /rdo rje gar

ni rab byas la/ /tshangs pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /pad ma'i thal mo sbyar byas te/ /snying ga'i thad kar bskor bar bya/ /gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis/ /rdo rje khu tshur bcang par bya/ /g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang
bar bya/ /g.yas pa g.yas su brkyang bar bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /g.yas brkyang

gom pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /de nyid kyis ni yang bskor ro/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /rdo rje khu tshur bskor bas na/ /bgegs rnams
thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis/ /sa bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni/ /gom pa bzhag pa'i 'gros kyis su/ /myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la/ /gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag /gcig

shos ti se'i rtse mor bzhag /de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni/ /kun du 'dor bar rab byed cing / /sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon/ /g.yas pa sa yi steng na ste/ /a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing / /'jig rten khams kun
'phen byed na/ /bgegs rnams gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams/ /mi yi 'jig rten 'di nas ni/ /gzhan du 'phen pa ci zhig smos/ /ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang / /kun nas

tshig par byed 'dod na/ /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par 'gyur/ /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stangs tshul gyis/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni/ /me lce phreng

ldan bzod dka' ba/ /rkang pa g.yon pa brtan byas la/ /rdo rje 'dzin de lag pa bsgreng / /lus ni btud par byas nas su/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas la/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /rlung rnams

kun yang sdud byed cing / /nam mkha' me 'drar bsgyur nas su/ /bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bur 'jug /lag na 'dzin pa'i rdo rje ni/ /kun du ri rab 'drar bsams la/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgras gnon zhing / /rdo rje 'og
tu 'phangs byas na/ /ri dang nags su bcas pa yi/ /sa rnams thams cad 'khrug par 'gyur/ /de nas thal ba nyid gyur te/ /mer ni shing bal bcug pa bzhin/ /slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba pos/ /de nas bsdu

ba brtsam byas te/ /rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid de/ /bye brag tu ni lag pa bsgreng / /rdo rje gom pas myur song la/ /mchongs pa bskor ba byas nas su/ /phyag rgya yi ni stangs stabs bya/ /rgyab nas stangs stabs

tshul gyis ni/ /dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya/ /de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang / /rdo rje bsnun pas brdeg par bya/ /stangs stabs tshul ni de nyid dang / /sngags pa blo ldan lag tshul gyis/ /sa rnams

thams cad blang byas la/ /de nyid du ni bzhag par bya/ /kun nas bsdu bar byed cing ni/ /mkhas pas gsang sngags brjod byas la/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad pa bzhin/ /sa rnams kun du bzhag par bya/ /rim pa yi
ni 'di nyid kyis/ /mkhas pa thams cad kun du bzhag /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /sdang ba lha dang lha min dang / /mi rnams bzhag bya gdul bar bya/ /bsam

dbang bzhin du 'byung ba yi/ /rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa/ /thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya/ /gdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni/ /gdung ba nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis su/ /dpa' bo lnga po kun du bya/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /'ben la lta zhing lag

pas gtang / /srin lag mthe'u chung sprad byas la/ /lag gnyis lu gu rgyud du bya/ /g.yon pa'i gung mo mtheb mtshungs sbyar/ /g.yas pa yi ni 'dzub mo de/ /brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni/ /gzhu dang mda' zhes
brjod pa yin/ /gung mo yi ni rgyab logs su/ /'dzub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag /g.yas brkyang stangs stabs tshul gyis su/ /hU~M bcas brjod de phog par bsnun/ /gal te sa yi 'og gnas sam/ /tshangs

pa'i gnas na gnas gyur tam/ /drag pos bsrungs par gyur kyang rung / /rdo rje 'phang bar sbyar nas su/ /rdo rje mda' yis phog gyur na/ /de ni gson par mi bsam mo/ /'phang ba'i stangs stabs so/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /

thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing / /'phang pa'i tshul du legs bslabs pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can gdul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje bzhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /srid pa gsum la khyab

lus kyis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar bya/ /'thun pa'i rkang bstabs byas nas su/ /rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya/ /de yi phyag rgya bcings

nas su/ /phyogs rnams kun du bskor byas na/ /srid pa gsum yang 'gugs 'gyur na/ /log 'dren bgegs rnams smos ci dgos/ /dgug pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /'thun pa'i rkang stabs

byas nas su/ /pad ma'i thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya/ /rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su/ /gnas ni myur du gzung byas la/ /rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag /khros pas hU~M gi sgra brjod de/ /rgya

mtsho bzhi po'i klu rnams la/ /rdo rje lag pas bsnun par bya/ /klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba dag /rgya mtsho nas ni thon par gyur/ /gang dag sa yi 'og gnas pa/ /lha min srin po gsang ba rnams/ /bsgo ba'i lung la brtsen yid kyis/ /

ci tshol cig ces 'khod par byed/ /rdo rje 'bar bas bdag nyid gzir/ /gnod sbyin mo 'am srin mo 'am/ /lha min mo 'am klu mo 'am/ /bcud kyis len nam dngul chu 'am/ /rin chen rnams dang nor bu rgyal/ /dpal dang phun sum 'dod

ldan nam/ /thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa/ /bdag cag rnams la bka' myur stsol/ /sngags pas gang yang rung blangs la/ /gsang ba kun du btang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal bar byed/ /ci ste bsgo yang mi 'ong na/ /rkang stabs

tshul ni de nyid kyis/ /g.yon brkyang stabs kyis gnon par bya/ /lhun po la ni rkang bzhag ste/ /lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sgra sgrog cing ni thams cad gnas/ /sa 'og thams cad gnon par bya/ /ha ha zhes

ni sgra 'don cing / /bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa/ /thams cad kyis ni gzung nas su/ /shin tu myur du dbug par byed/ /sngags pas de gcig tshar bcad de/ /lhag ma thams cad btang bar bya/ /bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la/ /

mkhas pas legs par bslab par bya/ /gsang ba srin po thams cad la/ /dgyes pa'i sems ni yang bskyed de/ /de dag dam tshig byin nas ni/ /de rnams kun du btang bar bya// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba

bam po bcu gcig pa/ de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /snying brtse snying rje sems ldan pas/ /mi dang mi min la sogs pa/ /shin du gnod byed lha rnams dang / /lha min gsang bar bcas rnams dang / /gzhan yang sdang
ba'i gdon la sogs/ /nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis/ /sems can rnams la gnod byed cing / /dam tshig la ni mi gnas te/ /rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dag /nad dang mu ge la sogs pas/ /sems can rnams

la gnod byed de/ /pha rol gnod byed mngon dga' ba/ /de dag snying rje med pa dang / /bstan pa la ni 'gal byed cing / /shin tu rgyags pa'i shas che ba/ /mthong nas de dag tshar bcad phyir/ /sngags la mkhas pas sbyar bar

bya/ /bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du/ /bdag nyid la ni mi sems shing / /bdag nyid lam min zhugs gyur la/ /gzhan dang gzhan yang phung byed pa/ /gzhan la gnod pa de dag la/ /sngags pas bzod pa mi bya ste/ /skrag par

bya zhing bcing bar bya/ /gtub par bya zhing bsad par bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje zhags pa legs bslabs pas/ /nam mkha' go skabs med byas te/ /rdo rje dbyibs su bsgyur nas su/ /gus pas

bsgrims bcas 'jo tshul dang / /bzhin 'dzum rgyas dang ldan pa yis/ /rdo rje gar ni rab byas la/ /lag pa bskyod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du gar bya zhing / /dngos dang mthun par bzung byas la/ /bsgom
pa la ni sems bzhag cing / /rdo rje rang bzhin lus sra bas/ /mi mthun rkang stabs tshul gyis ni/ /rdo rje 'chang bas lag bsgreng ste/ /rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la/ /srid pa gsum po thams cad

gnon/ /dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas nas su/ /rkang pa gdengs pa'i tshul gyis su/ /hU~M brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung / /mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste/ /kha ni rgod ma rta yi kha/ /lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo/ /lto

ba rgya mtshor bsam par bya/ /lhun po de yi mgo bor bya/ /de bzhin lag pa 'khor yug ri/ /sa ni rkang pa gnyis yin te/ /nor rgyas bu sprul gsang bsrel yin/ /rlung ni de yi rna ba gnyis/ /de yi skra rnams me yin te/ /

lce ni 'jigs pa chen po glog /a la la zhes sgra chen ldan/ /'brug sgra hU~M zhes sgra phyung bas/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs su bskor/ /rab tu bskul bas de nas ni/ /rdo rje sgra yis bsgyel gyur nas/ /klu dang dri

za srin po dang / /lha dang lha min sogs kun dong / /hU~M brjod pas ni 'jigs gyur zhing / /'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rdo rje sgra yis tshig 'gyur zhing / /blong bar gyur cing dman par blta/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor cher

ldan pa/ /ga la ba der nye bar dong / /rdo rje chen pos bka' stsal la/ /slan cad de ltar ma mdzad cig /de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la/ /lha rnams thams cad btang bar bya/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa gtum che ba/ /
'jigs pa chen po 'jigs byed pa/ /'jigs par bya rnams 'jigs bskyed pa/ /chen pos mchod 'os rmad byung bas/ /mi dang mi ma yin rnams la/ /'jigs chen ltas 'byung che 'byung dang / /lha dang

klu dang sha za dang / /gza' dang ma mo brtse med rnams/ /nad dang mu ge la sogs dang / /yul 'khrugs pa dang 'chi byed dang / /bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren dang / /srul po srin po la sogs pa'ang / /bdag

yul gzhan yul las byung ba'i/ /gnod pa gzhan yang du ma rnams/ /de dag rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed sbyar bar bya/ /rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod na/ /rdo rje
'jigs pas rab bskul bas/ /thams cad myur du 'jigs par 'gyur/ /'di ni don yod thogs pa med/ /rdo rje 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/ /sngags pas kun du sbyor byas nas/ /srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na/ /mi

yi 'jig rten mngag gzhug pa/ /byed par gyur pa smos ci dgos/ /tshig gis cung zad bskul bas na/ /gang dag shin tu dregs ldan pas/ /srin po lha min gsang ba pa/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje
ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /dbang phyug kun dang yon tan thob/ /lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur/ /mkhas pas dbang la 'god par byed/ /klu yi gnas su klu rnams dang / /gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin

dang / /dri za rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /lha min gnas su lha min dang / /mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang / /mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min mir bcas pa/ /bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus

sems kyis/ /rdo rje 'jigs sgra cher ldan pa/ /de yi dbang du thams cad 'gyur/ /rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /sgra chen po yi phyag rgya'o/ /kun la rdo rje rab 'phrul ba/ /de yi 'og tu brjod par bya/ /dpal ldan
mchod pa byed pa pos/ /phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs rnams kyi/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa kun du mchod/ /srid par bdag nyid che rnams kyi/ /bsam yas mchod min gang yang med/ /'dzum dang bcas shing mig rgyas

pas/ /g.yas pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis/ /rdo rje thal mo btsum byas la/ /phyogs bcu rnam pa kun du 'dud/ /dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /phyogs rnams kun du yongs bskor zhing / /dus gsum rnam par bzhugs pa yi/ /
sangs rgyas kun la phyag bya'o/ /bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod/ /sems can 'dul ba'i mchod pa ni/ /bsam pa ji bzhin 'jug pa ste/ /bsam pa tha dad sems can khams/ /bsam pa sna tshogs

rnam par 'phel/ /bsam pa sna tshogs rnam rtog pa/ /bsam pa chags med de dang des/ /sngags pas rnam pa thams cad du/ /sems can khams mang gdul bar bya/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /kun la shes pa'i cher

byung ba'i/ /sgeg dang dpa' dang snying rje dang / /rgod dang khro dang 'jigs byed dang / /'jigs rung rmad byung zhi ba rnams/ /bsam pa chags pas rnam dgur dgongs/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /kun la ye shes 'byung byed

pa'i/ /rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gom pas mdzes dang ldan pa yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni/ /gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su/ /'dzub mo mthe bo rtse sprad la/ /g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya/ /

g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar tshul gyis/ /'dzum bcas rgyas pa gus bsgrims shing / /lag na rdo rje gsor ldan pas/ /rjes su chags pas gar bya'o/ /lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang / /lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang / /
'dod khams dbang phyug dbang po dang / /sa gsum gnas rnams chags byed cing / /mig zur brgad dang lta ba yis/ /de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na/ /sa steng mi

rnams smos ci dgos/ /lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas/ /sdom pa can gyi dbang 'jog ste/ /thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing / /mngag gzhug par ni rab tu dgod/ /rdo rje cher ldan kun shes nas/ /rdo rje glu
ni blang bar bya/ /rdo rje glu yis bskul bas na/ /rjes su chags dang chags chen 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems dpar mos pa yis/ /glu dang gar ni rab tu bya/ /bsam pa chags pas rgyal gyur nas/ /sems can khams

ni rjes chags bya/ /rdo rje glu ni 'di yin no/ /sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' rjes su chags mdzad 'dul ldan pas/ /nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas rno ba'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa pos/ /rnam mang cha byad gzugs kyis
sems can 'gro ba rjes su chags mdzad pa/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang phyug dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol/ Sha Ta ba la sogs pa'i glu/ /rdo rje gar gyis bya ba na/ /sa gsum thams cad 'gugs

byed na/ /sa steng mi rnams smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje nyid du yang sgyur zhing / /rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thams cad la ni gar mkhan bya/ /gom stabs thams cad

mdzes ldan par/ /g.yas pa dgug pa'i phyag rgya dang / /g.yon pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya/ /mig zur brgad dang lta ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis/ /'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams

ni/ /rnam pa kun du dbang bsgyur te/ /mngag gzhug pa ni rab byed cing / /rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson/ /rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas/ /shin tu chags pas dregs myos pa'i/ /lha dang mi dang gsang ba pa/ /bsgrub bya rnams kyang
sngags pas bsgrub/ /rdo rje'i lus la yongs chags pas/ /'dod chags thams cad yongs su 'dor/ /rdo rje glu snyan ldan pa yis/ /sems can khams rnams chags par bya/ /rjes su chags pas chags pa'i phyir/ /

lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /rdo rje glu yi snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang / /bzod nas rang bzhin dag pas rdo rje sems dpa' bskul/ /sgyu ma'i dngos po rnam mang dang / /snyan pa'i sgra ni de nyid dang / /sangs rgyas

rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis/ /dbang bsgyur de nas sangs rgyas snang / /'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dren/ /bdud rnams thams cad yongs su 'dul/ /shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong / /sems can thams cad yongs

smin byed/ /glu 'di rab tu len byed cing / /rdo rje gar ni rab byas na/ /lha dang gang dag gnod sbyin dang / /lha min klur bcas thams cad 'grub/ /rdo rje glu yis 'dren pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje sems

dpar yang bsgyur te/ /dpa' chen bsam par kun chags pas/ /dpa' bo lnga po bsten par bya/ /'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa brkyang bas pha rol gnon/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /seng ge bzhin du

bsgyings par bya/ /tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te/ /rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang / /rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni/ /tshangs pa la sogs bsdu bar bya/ /rdo rje glu ni len byed cing / /sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa/ /nyi ma bye ba

'bar mtshungs pa/ /nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam med pa/ /chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi gtso/ /sangs rgyas sku mchog de la 'dud/ /so yis mchu ni rab gnon cing / /kun nas mig can khro gnyer bzhin/ /rked par

rdo rje brten nas su/ /phyogs bcu kun du blta bar bya/ /g.yas pa rdo rje tshul gyis ni/ /phyogs rnams kun du rab bsgrags pas/ /lta 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing / /bsreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan lta bu/ /grub 'gyur

rdo rje me 'bar ba/ /'jigs pa che ltar bzod dka' bas/ /bgegs rnams la ni sbyor bar bya/ /'jig rten gsum po thal bar rlog /nyes pa chen po ma yin la/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar mi bya/ /thun mong ma yin dgos pa ni/ /

tha ma'i tshe na sbyar bar bya/ /rdo rje 'chang bas bsrungs gyur kyang / /hU~M brjod pas ni thal bar rlog /'jig pa'i me ltar bzod dka' ba/ /rdo rje chen po phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje'i ye shes legs

bslabs pas/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis/ /bzhag nas 'di snyam bsam pa ste/ /sems dmyal yi dgas dud 'gro dang / /gang gzhan sdug bsngal sdug bsngal rnams/ /lag pas drang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /bde

ba kun gyis bstab par bya/ /gza' btung la sogs char pa dang / /gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char/ /de dag rnams la kun du dbab/ /ci bder yang dag bstabs pas na/ /snying rje spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin/ /kun du yongs su

rgyas par bya/ /sems can kun gyi bla med bde/ /thob par shog ces bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje can/ /rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing bya zhing / /mtshogs

mar thal mo sbyar bar bya/ /brgad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /de nas myur du mad par bya/ /rdo rje brgad chen phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du rgod/ /brgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas bteg ste/ /

g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag /g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/ /'jigs rung sgras ni rgyas byed cing / /thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya/ /'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yas brkyang rkang pa'i stabs byas te/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rgyal rol du/ /khu tshur gnyis ni bcang bar bya/ /bgegs kun 'dar bar bya ba'i phyir/ /mgul pa nges par smad bya zhing / /sgra chen rab tu brjod byas na/ /phyag rgya 'di
yi sbyor ba yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /lag pa gnyis ga lto bar gzhag /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs
sbyor ba yis/ /sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/ /ri rnams phye mar rlog byed na/ /sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te/ /sngags pa'i

'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur/ /'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /gdu bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya/ /de bzhin so yis ma mchu mnan/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba lags sbyar bas/ /bgegs
rnams kun la bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas/ /thams cad bzlog par gyur pa yin/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas

su/ /lag gnyis brang la sbyar ba las/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng byas te/ /lag pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar bas/ /tho ba yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rdo rje 'chang nyid yin pa 'ang bsnun/ /de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur/ /tho

ba'i stangs thabs so/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa mchan khung gzhug par bya/ /nyi ma 'bar 'dra'i lta 'dra bas/ /hU~M brjod bsnyems pas mthur du blta/ /lag na rdo rje nyid bsgyur te/ /'jigs su rung

ba'i sgra phyung la/ /rgya mtsho ma dAr bcas pa yis/ /sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar bya/ /so yis mchu ni mnan bya zhing / /rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas/ /de dag thams cad 'dar bar

'gyur/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag gnyis khu tshur bcang tshul gyis/ /g.yon pa brang la sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /'dzub mo myur du bsgreng byas shing / /rdo rje sgra ni dbyung byas na/ /

gal te sangs rgyas nyid bsgyur kyang / /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no/ /sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bskyod pas na/ /de dag thams cad dul

bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la/ /lag pa thal mo brkyang bar bya/ /g.yon pa brang du sbyar bar bya/ /lag pas myur du bsnun stabs kyis/ /hU~M dang bcas

pas sa la bsnun/ /nam mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba yi/ /ral gri phyag rgya bcing byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no/ /'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa 'og

tu bcug nas ni/ /rkang pa'i dbus nas bzung byas la/ /de ni gyen du bteg par bya/ /hU~M zhes rdo rje sgra dang ni/ /khros shing khro gnyer bcas pa yis/ /rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la/ /der ni bgegs ni bsam par bya/ /rdo rje

rkang pas bsnun byas na/ /ri rab rnams kyang phye mar rlog /rdo rje rkang pa'i stangs stabs so/ /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs sbyor ba yis/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du brkyang / /so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis/ /

kun du 'khor lo 'phang bar bya/ /phyogs rnams kun nas gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams zhig par 'gyur/ /zhig par 'gyur ba'i zhing rnams nas/ /rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang 'byon/ /byang chub sems dpa' rdzu

'phrul che/ /gang gzhan dbang ni thob 'gyur rnams/ /glong zhes gyur nas blo ldan pa/ /lag na rdo rje'i gan du dong / /srog zad na ni mi rung gis/ /bu gcig nged kyis ci zhig bya/ /khyod ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /nged kyis

myur du bsgrub bo zhes/ /rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan la/ /lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad/ /bskal pa me ltar gyur pa yis/ /g.yas brkyang stangs stabs byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar bas/ /
sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya/ /sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas/ /sngags pa rnams la rtag 'tshe ba/ /bgegs byed ma rungs chen po pa/ /srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go/ phyag rgya 'di

'dra mthong gyur nas/ /de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la/ /sa bas gyen du 'phang bar bya/ /de tshe sos ni mchu mnan la/ /myur du g.yo ba gcig bor te/ /nges par

bsnun pa bsnun de tshe/ /srin po sdang ba bgegs byed pa/ /de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur/ /rdo rje nges bsnun phyag rgya yis/ /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ /dbang chen gnas la gnas nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la/ /lhun po

rgyal po blangs nas su/ /lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas/ /sngags pa la ni bgegs byed pa/ /sdang ba'i sems can rnams la bsnun/ /bsnun pas rnam par phung 'gyur cing / /'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med/ /rnal 'byor gzhol ba'i

sngags pa la/ /gal te bsres shing bgegs byed na/ /de tshe sngags pa stobs chen gyis/ /phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di la rab sbyar ba/ /mthong nas de dag 'dar bar 'gyur/ /de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang / /rdo rje ye shes legs

bslabs pas/ /rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ /cod pan stangs kyi stabs bshad do/ /sngags pas shar phyogs kha bltas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa mtshogs mar bzhag /g.yon pa rked pa'i phyogs su bzhag /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la/ /

'brug sgra dal 'dra'i phyag rgya yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du bskor bar bya/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis kyang / /ngang pa'i rtsal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /lag pa g.yas pa gdengs byas na/ /rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par 'gyur/ /ngang pa'i rtsal

gyi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni sar btsugs la/ /a la la zhes rnam brgyan pas/ /sa gsum thams cad bteg byas na/ /rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang / /thams cad shin tu bteg par 'gyur/ /

man dA ra dang ti se dang / /gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang / /ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis/ /bsnun pa de dag slar mi 'chags/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang / /lag pa gnyis ni lto bar bzhag /hU~M brjod snyems pas mar bltas

te/ /so yis mchu ni mnan byas la/ /rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /de yi tshe na g.yon bteg ste/ /khros dang bcas pas rkang bzhag pas/ /sa

gsum thams cad drang bar bya/ /drang ba'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la/ /bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing / /'khor lo bzhin du phyogs su bskor/ /

phyag rgya 'di la legs sbyar bas/ /de dag bcings dang gzir bar 'gyur/ /bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed/ /rdo rje can gyis nyid kyis bshad/ /bgegs skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su/ /

rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas ni/ /lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bya/ /rkang pa gcig ni yongs su bskor/ /'khor lo cod pan phyag rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya/ /'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /

me tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis/ /de yi tshe na sa la bzhag /de nas myur du yang bteg go/ 'dis mchod pas na sngags pa la/ /thams cad bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro/ /mchod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po skrag par byed pa zhes bya ba'i stangs stabs yod de/ nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bskal pa dpag

tu med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rgyan gyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /de yis skrag par

byas nas bgegs/ /log 'dren thams cad gdungs par 'gyur/ /phyogs rnams kun du 'bros byed cing / /'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/ /lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas su/ /g.yon pa brkyang bar rab sbyar te/ /phyogs

rnams kun du bskor bar bya/ /de nas rkang pas yang mnan no/ /skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che/ /bgegs rnams thams cad bzlog pa ste/ /skrag pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing / /'chi bar gyur te the tshom med/ /de nas rkang

pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /mig ni mthur du lta byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng nas ni/ /g.yon pa brang la bcar byas te/ /lag pa sa la brdabs nas ni/ /rdo rje thal mos bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje thal mo'i stangs stabs so/ /rnal 'byor

stan la yang 'dug ste/ /mtshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la/ /rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su/ /'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor/ /'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs/ /

gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang / /de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur/ /rlung 'ching ba yi stangs stabs so/ /gar gyi tshul gyis legs bslabs pas/ /rkang pa spo bar byas pas yang / /lag pa thur du smad byas la/ /lag gnyis

mthe bo srin lag sprad/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs sbyar te/ /lag pa g.yas pas gar bya'o/ /gar gyis bgegs rnams thams cad ni/ /shin tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /dga' bas bsngags pa de la ni/ /de dag phyin

cad bgegs mi byed/ /mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bya ste/ /g.yon pa ral gri'i tshul byas la/ /gnyis ga gcig tu sbyar bar bya/ /gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang / /bgegs rnams thams cad drang

bar bya/ /kun nas shin tu drangs nas kyang / /de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya/ /rdo rje zhags pas bcing byas na/ /gnod par gyur pas kun du yang / /a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing / /sems ni glong zhes gyur pa yis/ /blo ldan lag na rdo rje la/ /

lung ni yongs su mnod par byed/ /phyin cad bgegs ni ma byed ces/ /lag na rdo rjes lung bsgo'o/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /sngags pa ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin/ /de nas snying rje yang bskyed de/ /sngags pas mnyam bzhag sa la ni/ /me tog

thal mo sbyar nas su/ /de yi tshe na de dag la/ /gang tshe sngags pa mnyam bzhag ste/ /khyed cag bgegs ni ma byed par/ /gnas su deng zhes brjod par bya/ /g.yas brkyang stangs stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya/ /

g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis kyang / /khu tshur mchan khung gnyis su gzhag /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa/ /sngags pa drag po'i las byed pas/ /phyogs rnams thams cad kun nas kyang / /rdo rje gzir bas gzir bar bya/ /gzhan yang

gang dag log 'dren bgegs/ /srin po gang dag grags pa dang / /rgod ma rta yi kha gdangs par/ /de dag thams cad gzir gyur cig /rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis/ /gzir nas de dag lhags gyur te/ /shin tu mi bzad 'dar byed cing / /srog

zad gyur na mi rung gis/ /ci tshol bka' ni myur gsol ces/ /bsgo ba'i lung ni gnod par byed/ /sngags pas ci 'dod lung bzhin du/ /gal te lung ni nod byed na/ /de lta na ni thar bar 'gyur/ /gzhan du na ni nam yang min/ /shin tu mi bzad gzir bas na/ /khyod ni ci bzhed de

bzhin du/ /bgyid kyis bka' lung stsol cig ces/ /de tshe de dag de skad smra/ /mtshogs mar rdo rje thal bzhag nas/ /de nas de dag dam tshig sbyin/ /sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris la/ /g.yas pa brkyang bas mnan nas su/ /rdo rje ral gri phyag

rgya yis/ /bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya/ /gtub par byas pas de dag kun/ /de la skyabs su 'gro bar byed/ /snying rjer ldan pa'i sems kyis su/ /de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya/ /snying rje sems kyis de dag la/ /ma 'jigs shig

ces smra bar bya/ /sngags pas de yi 'dod pa bzhin/ /de nas de dag rang gnas 'dod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod de/ gang ngas

bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po la phyag rgya gsum thob ste/ bskal pa du mar de bstan pa tsam gyis bgegs rnams kyis nga la ma gtses kyis

sems rtse gcig tu sgrims la de nyon cig /g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pa snying kar bzhag /g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis/ /mtshogs mar legs par bzhag par bya/ /bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yi/ /

dam tshig 'di ni brjod pa yin/ /'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang / /'bros par 'gyur te the tsom med/ /phyir zlog pa ni yang byas la/ /sa la lag pa brdab par bya/ /lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas su/ /de tshe mkhur ba bud par bya/ /rdo rje

phyag rgya bcing bas na/ /de tshe bgegs rnams bcom par 'gyur/ /rdo rje can ni ny-id gyur kyang / /rdo rje phyag rgyas bcom 'gyur na/ /mthong ba tsam gyis bgegs rnams kun/ /phung bar gyur pa smos ci dgos/ /sngags pa shar phyogs

bltas 'dug la/ /lag pa g.yas pa dkur brten te/ /g.yon pa brkyang ba legs byas la/ /g.yon pas thams cad dgug par bya/ /thams cad nas ni bkug nas su/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/ /rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun pas

na/ /de yi mod la phye mar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje nga'i slob ma rnams ma gtogs par khyod kyis su la snyad par mi bya'o/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ sems can ma dad pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing de dag 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur bas/ de dag gi rna lam du yang bsgrag par mi bya na phyag rgya lta ci smos/

gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams kyi mtshan nyid shes nas sbyin par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no/ /de nas lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol

to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang dag slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skrag par 'gyur gyis de skad

ma smra shig /gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang cung zhig brjod par bya'i/ dpa' bo bsgrims te de nyon cig /mtshams med la sogs mi bzad pa/ /dmyal ba gang dag ngas bshad pa/ /de rnams kyi n-i gnas su brjod/ /der

ni bskal pa mtha' yas so/ /de lta bas na rnam kun du/ /de la nam yang brnyas mi bya/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po slob dpon la slob mas ji ltar blta bar bya zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba bzhin du'o/ /

de yi sems ni de lta na/ /rtag tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'jig rten thams cad la/ /phan par byed pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/ stangs stabs kyi rim par

phye ba rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor lo'i dkyil

'khor du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'dug cing / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i

rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas gyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag

gis/ ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dpag tu med pa bsgrub pa'i don du thugs su chud nas de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhin du phyag brkyang ste lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag go/ bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to/ /sems dpa' chen po legs so legs/ /rdo rje ye shes rdzogs byed pa/ /khyed ni sangs rgyas byas pa gzo/ /sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog /dam pa gsang
ba khyod kyis shod/ /gzung sngags tshul du dgod byos la/ /gang du zhugs ma thag tu ni/ /sdig pa thams cad med gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bshad par gyis/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas

kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskums so/ /de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed ma/ nad thams
cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad skyed ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i mchog 'di smras so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu

khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he bud d+ha ma ti ri/ sarba pA pa ni Sha ni gardza gardza/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ marda marda gam+b+hI ri gam+b+hI ra/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bid+h+wa na sa ya bid+h+wa na sa ya/ sarba sha trun ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/ pu ra

ya pu ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba b+hU ta pa r+'u pa si te/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma la sa ni/ kra ma Ni ha da ba ni/ ra ma Na/ ma ta~M gi ke swA hA/ lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags gsang ba 'di smras ma thag tu de

nas de'i mod la sa chen po 'di 'gul lo/ /'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /ldeg rab tu ldeg go/ lho phyogs mtho na/ nub phyogs dma'o/ /byang mtho na/ shar phyogs dma'o/ /nyi ma dang zla ba yang sa la lhung ngo / /

rig sngags 'chang rnams kyang lhung ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang myos myos por gyur to/ /thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang glong glong por gyur te/ 'jam dpal

gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag 'tshal zhing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de glong glong por gyur pa mthong nas de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye grogs po dag khyod kyis ye shes

chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen mo dran par gyis shig /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu chen

po ni yin na/ sgrub pa po gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang yid la byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa'i mthu ci lta bur rig par bya de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur

gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal gzungs sngags 'di'i mthu 'am nus mthu 'am mthu bsgyings pa ci 'dra'o/ /'jam dpal shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/

'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das des thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs

sngags 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tog la 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' de la byin ma thag tu de'i mod la gzungs sngags 'di'-i mthus de'i spu'i khung bu thams cad nas
sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams byung zhing zhugs te/ mtha' rtogs par ni mi nus so/ /sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams

cad la dbang thob pa de dag gis kyang 'di ci 'dra ba yin zhes bstan par mi nus so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la 'od zer gyis dbang bskur nas sku de nyid du zhugs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so/

/de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad

kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba yin na/ khyod kyis kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shod cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po
lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal las don yod par grub par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes gang dag gzungs sngags kyi tshul du

gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dag nyon cig de dag gang zhe na/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA/ a ma ri/ a ma ri/ Ta ta/ bany+dza dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsi mi tsi/ spo Ta spo Ta/ ma ta ma ta/

du ra dan+ta da ma ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA he he ka ni Ti ka ni ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta ba na ke bo dan+di de/ tra Ta Ta tra Ta Ta/ hU~M phaT hU~M phaT/ gardza gardza/ ba ra ma ti/ bi hU~M` ri ka swA hA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te

b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA b+ha ga ba te/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA A/ sarba pA pak+Sha ya~M ka ri/ dz+nyA na a pa sa spa ra Ni/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ A na ya/ A na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ sarba b+hU te dza na tri ye swA hA/ na maH

sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma tha/ hA ma hA ma/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ dun+du b+hi swa ra ni ra g+ho She/ ha na ha na/ bi d+hA na sa ya bi d+h+wan sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi pu la nirmA la ni ra dzA te/ A ha ra A ha ra A

gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ sarba bud d+ha sa ru pa pi te mA bi ba~M ba swA hA/ 'jam dpal gzungs sngags chen po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed ma/ byang chub kyi snying po

ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mig mi 'dzums par byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di skad ces smras so/ /rigs kyi

bu khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma mthong ba rnams dang dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas

gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dbang chen po bskur ba'i gzungs sngags

la sogs pa ye shes bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las nges par byung ba'i ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to/ /ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i

sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur to/ /kye ma'o ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas/ /'jam dpal 'di la dbang bskur to zhes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur ces grags so/ /de'i mthus 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag uta pa la chen po'i nang du zhugs par mthong ngo / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma

thag tu/ de nas chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mthus de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spu'i khung bu'i mtshan rnams dang cod pan dang rgyan dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs

rnams byung zhing zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa de dag gis kyang spu'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na nyan thos dang rang sangs

rgyas rnams dang gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyis lta ci smos/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yid la byed pa de btang ste/ yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzums par ring du bltas
nas/ zhing rnams 'di dag yongs su sbyang bar bya/ /rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthu rdzogs bya/ /sems can phan dang snying brtse nad med cing / /zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan/ /ye shes
dam pa gces pa 'di thob nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag /grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa dgrol bar bya/ /khyod kyis ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya/ /zhes ched du brjod pa 'di

ched du brjod do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal legs so legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di smras pa ni shin tu gtsigs te khyod yang

legs so/ /'jam dpal khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la byed pa ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa'o/ /'jam dpal yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag ye shes chen po 'di lta bu dag

yid la byed pa dang 'dzin pa dang bsgrub pa dang glegs bam du byas nas nyin gcig bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ de dag ni nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /de dag

'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas pa na yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur

ro/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gang gi tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

kyi go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir mngon par brtson par byed pa dag go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de sems can

chen po shod cig /de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal gang du zhugs pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga bdag

yongs su byang bar 'gyur ba dang don thams cad kyang 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / dpal thams cad skyed par 'gyur ba dang sdig pa thams cad las rab tu grol bar 'gyur ba ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba'i gzungs
sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par dgod pa de nyon cig /'jam dpal dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal de la lus can thams cad la gsang chen dang bcas pa slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog /

gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ming du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o/ /'jam dpal de la dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la/ tshad ni khru brgya tham pa ste/ /

slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor der/ /cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya/ /blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du/ /der ni sgo khyud rnams byas te/ /der ni sgo yang bzhi gdod do/ /gru bzhi lham pa kha

khyer bcas/ /sngon gyi bzhin du cha gsum la/ /cha ni rnam pa brgyad brgyad bya/ /mkhas pas cha brgyad byas nas su/ /dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya/ /chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/ /thang cig thang cig bsam

byas la/ /phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya/ /sngags pas de yi dbus su ni/ /pad ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri/ /kun kyang ma rgad 'dra ba ste/ /'dab ma brgyad pa brjod pa yin/ /de yi

steng du bum pa ste/ /bum pa'i steng du uta pa la/ /uta pal steng du dung bri ste/ /me lce phreng bas 'khrigs pas mdzes/ /shes rab pha rol phyin de ni/ /ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan/ /cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang / /dbus

kyi cha las byung ba ste/ /gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang / /cho ga rim bzhin 'thun par bya/ /de la shar phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo dbang po chen po'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa ut+pa la'i phyag rgyar bri bar bya

ste/ mtha' rnams su ut+pa la bkram zhing me lce 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas par bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu

khe b+h+yaH sarba thA rA oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ti dza ni ge/ /su ra ya pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta ta Ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hU~M hU~M dza hi dza hi swA hA/ dbang ldan gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/

chu'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /pad ma shin tu mdzes pa bri/ /de yi steng du 'khor lo ste/ /me lce phreng bas 'khrigs pa mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA hU~M hrIH sarba

pad+ma/ ta hrIH b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma ma ni da ma ma ni/ gar+g+ga ri gar+g+ga ri hrIHswA hA/ me'i phyogs su brten nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi/ /

phyag rgya gzugs rnams bri bar bya/ /pad ma'i steng du rdo rje ste/ /me lce nang du shin tu mdzes/ /de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA tra Ta tra Ta/ mu hU mu hU/ sarba pA pa~M sho d+ha ne swA hA/ lho phyogs

su ni gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ me dang rlung dang ldan pa yi/ /ut+pa la ni der bri'o/ /de yi steng du rin po che/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs skong ste/ /me lce phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba/ /pad ma rnams

kyis yongs su bskor/ /de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA d+ha ka d+ha ka /mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ni R+dzA te swA hA/ bden bral phyogs su ni bdud

thams cad rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /pad ma'i dbus su gnas pa yin/ /de yi steng du bsngags pa yis/ /lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bri/ /phan tshun

'brel pa'i rdo rje dag /blo dang ldan pas der dgod do/ /de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA ha ha/ mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ dur

dAn+ta da ma ni swA hA/ byang phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin/ /de yi steng du pad ma ste/ /

'od ni dus mtha'i me lta bu/ /de yi steng du ral gri ste/ /'od zer rnams kyis rab tu bskor/ /me lce phreng ba 'khrigs ldan pa'i/ /ut+pal rnams kyis kun khyab bya/ /de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/ /na maHsarba

ta thA ga te b+h+yaH sarba mu khe b+h+yaH sarba thA mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ swA hA/ rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de yi rlung gi dkyil
'khor te/ /cha gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas/ /lcags kyus thams cad dgab par bya/ /me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bar ldan/ /nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma skul byed ma bri bar bya ste/ de yi dbang ldan

dkyil 'khor te/ /de la rdo rje legs par gnas/ /de yi steng du pad ma che/ /de yi steng du bgrang nor phreng / /de dag me lce phreng gis dkris/ /steng du pad ma rnams kyis gdab/ /de nas cha gsum pa la ni/ /byang chub

sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che/ /sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya/ /brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin/ /de la shar du rnal 'byor pas/ /'jig rten dbang po'i 'od chen bri/ /pad ma shin tu mdzes pa ni/ /de yi phyag rgya

brjod pa yin/ /me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o/ /dbang bdag phyogs su ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyag rgya uta pa la bri bar bya'o/ /

lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya rdo rje bri bar bya'o/ /byang phyogs su ni byams pa'i phyag rgya ril ba spyi blugs bri bar bya'o/ /rlung gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya pad ma bri bar

bya'o/ /bden bral gyi phyogs su ni nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya ral gri bri bar bya'o/ /nub phyogs su ni sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya pad ma bri bar bya'o/ /de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag

na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lag na rdo rje legs so legs so/ /lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil

'khor brjod pa khyod yang legs so/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang skur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di su'i

lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang dgra dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang

na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /chom rkun gyis 'joms par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung /

rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i tshe na

yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su gzigs par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur na/ gang du 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang yid la byed pa dang ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te

de'i sgrib pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /des ngan song gi sgo rnams gcad par 'gyur/ des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang ring du 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nang par langs nas su/ /lan cig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srid pa'i

nyam ngar byas pa yi/ /sdig las grol bar de 'gyur ro// //'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba bam po bcu gnyis pa ste tha ma/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas

byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas der zhugs par gyur na de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal

kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par mi nus mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni sa'i rdul pa de du rig par bya'o/ /'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems

can sdig can gang tshul 'di la yid mi ches pa dag yod de/ 'jam dpal the tshom mang ba dang rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang pha la ma gus pa dang ma la

ma gus pa dang slob dpon dang bla ma la smod pa dang bla ma'i skyon 'bru ba'i sems can de dag la ni ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu 'chang du mi bzhug go/ rna lam du yang grag

par mi bya'o/ /'jam dpal de dag gi mdun du ni gtam yang mi bya'o/ /glegs bam du bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar mi bya ste/ sems can sdig can de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang ngan song sems can

dmyal bar 'gro bar myur du 'ong ngo / /'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer te/ de dag ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan dag kyang phung bar byed do/ /de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngags

kyi dngos grub med do zhes kho bo smra'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/ de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par gyur nas nges par 'byin pa dang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan

med do/ /de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa yin no/ /'jam dpal ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa yin te/ de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas

'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang klog pa pa de'i bsod

nams kyi phung po ji tsam yod par rig par bya/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam pa de'i

bsod nams kyi phung po yang de tsam du rig par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ tshul 'di ma rtogs pa blun po de dag gis ni mi shes so/ /'jam dpal

gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

mchod pa'i sprin rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdud pham par byed pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa dang /

chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams cad la zhugs pa yin no/ /de ci'i

phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir te/ de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di ma gtogs pa de las gzhan med do/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba yin no/ /'jam dpal phyogs gang du ye shes chen por

dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am gang gi lag na 'chang ba 'am gang gi phyir 'dri ba 'am/ gang zhig nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo / /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la nyin gcig bzhin du gzigs par 'gyur ro/ /'chi kar yang de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku ston par mdzad do/ /'jam dpal ltos dang sa la gnas pa'i shing dang

nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do/ /'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag la gnas

te/ 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang rnyed do/ /bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed do/ /byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /de nas sems can

gyi don rnam pa sna tshogs kyang byed de/ 'di dag thams cad gzungs 'di dag gi mthu yin no/ /'jam dpal de lta bas na khyod kyis kyang chongs shig /lhogs shig /yid la byos shig /gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang / des

sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal sa phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro/ /gang

gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/ /'jam dpal sngags pa de la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag tu byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/ /sngags pa des kyang gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil

'khor 'di rin po che'i za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal sems can gang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus pa med pa'i rang bzhin can dang slob dpon gyi skyon 'bru ba dag

yod pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du yang bzlas par mi bya/ glegs bam yang bstan par mi bya/ nan gyis dkyil 'khor du yang dbang bskur ba dang klog tu bzhug pa da bltar gzhug pa lta ci smos/ 'jam

dpal 'di lta bu dag ltar bzhug pa dang tshig tu 'byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o/ /de ni 'khrul pa chen po dang shin tu kha na ma tho ba

chen po yin no/ /'jam dpal sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bslu ba ni sla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba ni de lta ma yin no/ /'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba ni dkon te/ dper na u dum ba

ra'i me tog bzhin no/ /de bas kyang gzungs 'di 'dra ba dag ston pa ni dkon no/ /de bas kyang nan tan gyis sgrub pa dkon no/ /de bas kyang 'di gang dag gi lag na 'chang ba dang gang dag 'di nyan pa dang klog pa dang 'dzin pa

dang yang na dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon/ sems can 'di dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' yang rtogs par mi nus na/ gang nang par langs nas lan cig klog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i

mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa rnams yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de la 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/

/de'i lus la nad thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang la las dben pa'i phyogs su ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs la me tog phul nas tshes grangs dang zhag phyed pa dang yud tsam dang dus bzang po la gro ga la bris sam/ yang

na yar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam tshes bcwa lnga la spos dang me tog dang bdug pa dang lha bshos phul la/ mar gyi mar me brgyad dang gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas gro ga la bris te mgul pa 'am dpung ba 'am lag ngar ram rked pa

la btags la/ thab mo 'gyed pa'i nang du 'gro 'am lam du 'gro 'am rgyal po'i pho brang du 'gro na yang de la 'jigs pa de dag thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal 'di ni sems can la bsrung ba'i mchog

yin te/ khyim mam gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dug pa'i gnas der bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /'jam dpal gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung bas bsrung
